title: My Recorded Repaly Highlights are screeching
body: I was playing Thresh on my TR account (same name different region) and I made some hook plays that I wanted to record to watch again later. The replay was extremely smooth with some lags because of my pc but after I watched the recorded there was loud screeching and the lag spikes were too high. Id this only happening to me?

replies.body: I am having the same screeching audio issue. I turned off synapse and any voice chat program too. Nothing seems to fix it. It happens on like 90% of my recordings.
Can you try launching into the replay for this game again and record a new highlight? Does it still screech as well?

Might still be relevant even though this was 2 weeks ago, but I'm still having the same issue.  Very loud screeching sound the first couple patches from Pre-Season.  However, has decreased in how loud it is in this patch.  Every highlight I try to make has the same issue.  If needed, I can provide a link to a private video I made for a separate post to give you an idea of what I'm having to deal with.

Are you using Razer Synapse or a Razer headset by chance? I've seen reports of issues with both their headsets and with Synapse causing issues on the Beta Client for audio. Additionally, if you have any sort of audio application running in the background (discord, skype, control panels for audio, etc) you may want to close them about before recording or watching a highlight, since they can interfere with your audio.

Let me know if this helped.
It might be too late but I'm having the same problem and with no spund apps running in the background nor those headsets

I'm having the same issue now.  When I record to a full game length "highlight" it has a terrible screeching sound. I remade the highlight and tried different speeds, but it still screeches. I can reproduce this on different recordings, not the same one. They also sound fine when its still a rofl file in client, but screeches when its recorded to a highlight.

> [{quoted}](name=Wooddawg74,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fPAr5cit,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-01T05:06:53.794+0000)

I can reproduce this on different recordings, not the same one. They also sound fine when its still a rofl file in client, but screeches when its recorded to a highlight.

Having the same problem
I'm having this issue too...it sucks! It also seems laggy; doesn't get 60 fps. Tried closing all audio things (Discord, Skype, Synapse, Logitech Gaming), didn't help.
